bibliographic-data.invention-title: System and Method for Multi-Enterprise Supply Chain Optimization

abstract.p: A method of optimizing multi-enterprise supply chain agreements using an electronic scenario based option contract includes creating at a buyer computer a plurality of scenarios of forecasted demand for one or more products and communicating from the buyer computer to a seller computer an offer to enter into an option contract for the supply of the one or more products, the option contract including an option corresponding to each of the plurality of scenarios of forecasted demand. The method further includes executing the option contract, receiving at the buyer computer an indication of current buyer demand for at least one scenario associated with the one or more products, and exercising at least a portion of the option in the option contract based at least in part on the indicated buyer demand.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: System and method for multi-enterprise supply chain optimization
SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR MULTI-ENTERPRISE SUPPLY CHAIN OPTIMIZATION
SYSTEME ET PROCEDE D'OPTIMISATION D'UNE CHAINE D'APPROVISIONNEMENT ENTRE PLUSIEURS ENTREPRISES

abstract.p: A method of optimizing multi-enterprise supply chain agreements using an electronic option contract includes determining at a buyer computer a range of forecasted demand for a product and communicating from the buyer computer to a seller computer an offer to enter into an option contract for the supply of a product, the option contract including an option corresponding to the range of forecasted demand. The method further includes executing the option contract , updating at the buyer computer the forecasted demand, and exercising the option in the option contract within the range of forecasted demand based on the updated forecasted demand.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: System and method for multi-enterprise supply chain optimization
System und Verfahren zum Optimieren von Versorgungsketten zwischen mehreren Unternehmen
Système et procédé d'optimisation d'une chaîne d'approvisionnement entre plusieurs entreprises
System and Method for Multi-Enterprise Supply Chain Optimization

abstract.p: A method of optimizing multi-enterprise supply chain agreements using an electronic scenario based option contract includes creating at a buyer computer a plurality of scenarios of forecasted demand for one or more products and communicating from the buyer computer to a seller computer an offer to enter into an option contract for the supply of the one or more products, the option contract including an option corresponding to each of the plurality of scenarios of forecasted demand. The method further includes executing the option contract, receiving at the buyer computer an indication of current buyer demand for at least one scenario associated with the one or more products, and exercising at least a portion of the option in the option contract based at least in part on the indicated buyer demand. A procurement manager and a supply manger operable to be executed on the processor of a buyer computer and seller computer respectively, for being able to carry out the method of optimizing multi-enterprise supply chain agreements.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR MULTI-ENTERPRISE SUPPLY CHAIN OPTIMIZATION.
SISTEMA Y METODO PARA LA OPTIMIZACION DE LA CADENA DE SUMINISTRO DE VARIAS EMPRESAS.

abstract.p: A method of optimizing multi-enterprise supply chain agreements using an electronic option contract includes determining at a buyer computer a range of forecasted demand for a product and communicating from the buyer computer to a seller computer an offer to enter into an option contract for the supply of a product, the option contract including an option corresponding to the range of forecasted demand. The method further includes executing the option contract, updating at the buyer computer the forecasted demand, and exercising the option in the option contract within the range of forecasted demand based on the updated forecasted demand.

Un metodo para optimizar los acuerdos de la cadena del suministro de varias empresas usando un contrato de opcion electronica que incluye determinar en una computadora de comprador un intervalo de demanda prevista para un producto y comunicar desde la computadora de comprador a una computadora de vendedor una oferta para entrar en un contrato de opcion para el suministro de un producto, el contrato de opcion que incluye una opcion que corresponde al intervalo de la demanda prevista. El metodo incluye, ademas, ejecutar el contrato de opcion, actualizar en la computadora comprador la demanda provista, y ejercer la opcion en el contrato de opcion dentro del intervalo de la demanda prevista en base a la demanda prevista, actualizada.

SYSTEME ET PROCEDE D'OPTIMISATION D'UNE CHAINE D'APPROVISIONNEMENT ENTRE PLUSIEURS ENTREPRISES

nplcit.text: ANONYMOUS: "A Supply Chain Management Algorithm with Vendor Information via Internet" RESEARCH DISCLOSURE, vol. 41, no. 416, XP002126531 Havant, UK, article No. 416111

abstract.p: A method of optimizing multi-enterprise supply chain agreements using an electronic option contract includes determining at a buyer computer a range of forecasted demand for a product and communicating from the buyer computer to a seller computer an offer to enter into an option contract for the supply of a product, the option contract including an option corresponding to the range of forecasted demand. The method further includes executing the option contract, updating at the buyer computer the forecasted demand, and exercising the option in the option contract within the range of forecasted demand based on the updated forecasted demand.

L'invention concerne un procédé pour optimiser des contrats de chaîne d'approvisionnement entre plusieurs entreprises au moyen d'un contrat d'option électronique. Le procédé consiste à déterminer, au niveau de l'ordinateur d'un acheteur, une gamme de demandes prévues pour un produit et à communiquer de l'ordinateur de l'acheteur à celui du vendeur une offre de passer un contrat d'option pour l'approvisionnement d'un produit, le contrat d'option incluant une option correspondant à la gamme des demandes prévues. Le procédé consiste en outre à exécuter le contrat d'option, à mettre à jour au niveau de l'ordinateur de l'acheteur la demande prévue, et à mettre en oeuvre l'option stipulée dans le contrat d'option, dans les limites de la gamme de demandes prévues, sur la base de la demande prévue mise à jour.
